materials_and_care.pros: Self‐oiling—high rot resistance, Beautiful golden patina over time, Mint Teak is only from sustainable and certified teak plantations so incredibly environmentally friendly, If left untreated, will form a beautiful silver-grey patina that still offers very good weather protection due to the natural oils and tannins protecting the teak,, High strength to weight ratio
materials_and_care.cons: High cost, Annual maintenance to preserve color, Be aware, some retailers acquire poorer grade teak from uncertified and unsustainable plantations which contributes to damaging deforestation, Sustainability concerns if not FSC-certified
materials_and_care.maintenance: Clean with teak cleaner, lightly sand, apply teak oil per grain direction.

materials_and_care.pros: 100% recyclable PE, Built-in UV absorbers prevent brittleness, Tested to UV 2000h for long-term colour & strength equating to at least 3 years of UV protection in the UK, Replacement parts available free for 1 year and after that are available at a modest cost
materials_and_care.cons: Can snap if frozen and thawed repeatedly, Salt spray can accelerate degradation without proper UV additives
materials_and_care.maintenance: Cover during harsh weather to extend life, Avoid dragging on frozen surfaces, Rinse away salt deposits with fresh water
materials_and_care.warranty: 2 years (Structural integrity and colour retention under normal use)

materials_and_care.name: Steel

materials_and_care.cons: Heavier to move, Requires protective coating to prevent rust
materials_and_care.maintenance: Inspect coatings, touch-up paint as needed, clean with mild detergent.

Willow Modular Garden 2 Seater Sofa

Willow Modular Teak Garden Oval Coffee Table

materials_and_care.name: Teak
materials_and_care.pros: Self‐oiling—high rot resistance, Beautiful golden patina over time, Mint Teak is only from sustainable and certified teak plantations so incredibly environmentally friendly, If left untreated, will form a beautiful silver-grey patina that still offers very good weather protection due to the natural oils and tannins protecting the teak,, High strength to weight ratio
materials_and_care.cons: High cost, Annual maintenance to preserve color, Be aware, some retailers acquire poorer grade teak from uncertified and unsustainable plantations which contributes to damaging deforestation, Sustainability concerns if not FSC-certified
materials_and_care.maintenance: Clean with teak cleaner, lightly sand, apply teak oil per grain direction.

materials_and_care.name: Acacia
materials_and_care.pros: Hard-wearing, Affordable alternative to teak although without the same durability, Environmentally friendly as always taken from managed and sustainable plantations, Attractive grain patterns
materials_and_care.cons: Requires sealant yearly, Can split if untreated, There can be some colour variations batch-to-batch but some users enjoy this natural ebb and flow of the material
materials_and_care.maintenance: Clean, sand, and seal with clear outdoor wood sealant.
materials_and_care.warranty: 3 years (rotting/splitting is possible if left untreated)

materials_and_care.maintenance: Wipe with mild soap solution as needed.

materials_and_care.name: Concrete
materials_and_care.pros: Modern industrial look, Highly durable and weather-resistant, Customizable shapes and finishes
materials_and_care.cons: Very heavy and may need reinforced frames, Porous so needs periodic sealing, Can crack under freeze-thaw if not sealed properly
materials_and_care.maintenance: Seal surface annually to prevent staining, Clean with pH-neutral cleaner, Avoid abrasive scrubbing
materials_and_care.warranty: 3 years (Structural integrity and finish under normal use)
